title: MBallSectionsDR
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The Week: Trump Tells It Like It Is in Gaza
items.description: Plus: The EPA’s historic blow against intrusive regulation.

items.title: Corporate Media Elevated This Anti-Trump Ex-Spook As Author Of Russia ICA. She Wasn’t.
items.description: It turns out, the 'author' that Trump-hating corporate media outlets used to defend shoddy ICA wasn’t an author after all.

items.title: Hawley’s Tariff-Rebate Plan, Slightly Tweaked, Is a Good Step
items.description: Rebates tied to inflation can turn the lemon of inflation into the lemonade of a GOP that directly helps the working class.

items.title: Baltimore Confronted Its Crime Problem by Abandoning Social Justice Platitudes
items.description: Idealism may come easier to academics, but reality-based strategies benefit the communities in need.

items.title: Clapper And Brennan Said Three Things In NYT Op-Ed. Each Was A Lie
items.description: For all of their supposed concern about 'misrepresentations and disinformation,' Clapper and Brennan are some of their biggest perpetrators.

items.title: Election Integrity Watchdog: New York’s Voter Rolls Are A ‘Disaster’
items.description: A PILF review found nearly 50,000 registrants on the Empire State's rolls are registered in at least one other state.

items.title: Trump calls on Senate to stay in D.C. to vote on more than 150 nominees
items.description: President Trump wants the Senate to stay in session until it clears a backlog of more than 150 judicial and executive-branch nominees.

items.title: Biden judge blocks Trump from ending deportation amnesty for Honduras, Nicaragua, Nepal
items.description: A federal judge ordered Homeland Security to continue a deportation amnesty for migrants from Honduras, Nicaragua and Nepal, slamming President Trump ...

items.title: EXCLUSIVE: DOJ Official Who Approved $2 Million Payout To Disgraced Russia Hoaxers Identified As Left-Wing Activist Brian Netter
items.description: Netter now works for a group chaired by Marc Elias, who helped run the Russia collusion hoax.

items.title: How The Propaganda Press Jumped On The Russia Hoax And Tried To Save Hillary’s Floundering Campaign
items.description: The press that lied about Russia is not backing off after seeing the Durham Annex. Instead is in denial or looking for a new spin.

items.title: Ending the H-1B Visa Lottery Is a Good Step
items.description: Our immigration policies should align with our nation’s interests.

items.title: Trump revives Presidential Fitness Test alongside famous athletes at White House event
items.description: President Trump on Thursday revived the Presidential Fitness Test in public schools, saying it was to ensure young Americans are healthy and active.
